‚ö° Quick Start Guide

1. Database Migration (Required):

Copy and run the SQL commands in your Supabase SQL Editor to add the images[] column.

2. Test Image Upload:

Visit /test-image-upload to verify the upload system works correctly.

3. Try the Forms:

Go to /admin/applications/new and try uploading images using drag & drop or file selection.

4. Production Setup (Optional):

Configure Supabase Storage for real image uploads instead of placeholder images.
